channel.title: 508 Rights
channel.description: Hello everyone i have a 508 server the source is berky-scape and i wana make more positions like technician hidden co hidden owner hiden mod,staff ect i tried to make a one with the player rights 120 for owner but it didnt work how do i do make it work do u have to put the rights levels into a file and how do u make a command only work for lets say player right 2 and up one more thing is there a limit on the player rights can it only be a number from 0-10 or 0-5 0-3 and if so how do i change

item.title: 508 Rights
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

right 1 - Moderator
right 2 - Administrator
right 3 - Owner
right 4 - hidden admin

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Rights

item.description:

Hello everyone i have a 508 server
the source is berky-scape and i wana make more positions like technician
hidden co
hidden owner
hiden mod,staff ect
i tried to make a one with the player rights 120 for owner but it didnt work
how do i do make it work do u have to put the rights levels into a file
and how do u make a command only work for lets say player right 2 and up
one more thing
is there a limit on the player rights can it only be a number from 0-10 or 0-5 0-3 and if so how do i change
